Method Detail

getNodeList

public static org.w3c.dom.NodeList getNodeList(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                               java.lang.String tagName,
                                               int minSize,
                                               int maxSize)
                                        throws InvalidFormatException
Get a node list with specified tag name from the element.

Parameters:
element - the element to get the node list from
tagName - the tag name of the node list
minSize - the minimum number of item that must exist in the node list
maxSize - the maximum number of item that can exist in the node list
Returns:
the node list
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - if the minSize or maxSize condition cannot be fulfilled

getElement

public static org.w3c.dom.Element getElement(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                             java.lang.String tagName,
                                             boolean mustExist)
                                      throws InvalidFormatException
Get the element with the tag name from the element.

Parameters:
element - the element to get the element from
tagName - the tag name of the element
mustExist - indicate the element must exist or not, if is true but element not found, an exception will be thrown
Returns:
the element
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - mustExist is true but element not found

getTextContent

public static java.lang.String getTextContent(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                              java.lang.String tagName,
                                              boolean mustExist)
                                       throws InvalidFormatException
Get the text content with the tag name from the element.

Parameters:
element - the element to get the text content from
tagName - the tag name of the text content
mustExist - indicate the text content must exist or not, if is true but text content not found, an exception will be thrown
Returns:
the text content
Throws:
InvalidFormatException - mustExist is true but text content not found/exist

the output
